scenes.description: Continuation and conclusion of the performance of 'Bling-Bang-Bang-Born'.
A dramatic transition sequence featuring audio-visual effects leading into the next song.
Performance of the song 'Los! Los! Los!', originally from the anime 'The Saga of Tanya the Evil'.

subtitles.original: 誰も口は挟めない
subtitles.english: No one can interfere

subtitles.original: Don't test
subtitles.english: Don't test

subtitles.original: 隠れる気もない　全開も無い　言うてBling-Bling
subtitles.english: No intent to hide, no limit, I say "Bling-Bling"

subtitles.original: この存在自体が文化財の脳みそBling-Bling
subtitles.english: This existence itself is a cultural asset, brains going "Bling-Bling"

subtitles.original: 極彩色ばかり目眩まない愛車Bling-Bling
subtitles.english: Rich colors everywhere, never dazzled, devotion going "Bling-Bling"

subtitles.original: 全知全能かく地リラックス一遍このベロがBling-Bling
subtitles.english: Omniscient, relaxed everywhere, this tongue going "Bling-Bling"

subtitles.original: パレットなら満タン　関西訛り生身の言霊
subtitles.english: Magazines are full, Kansai accent, living power of words

subtitles.original: 音楽も処理の女神今宵様々バンバン
subtitles.english: Even music is a processing goddess, various things tonight, Bang-Bang

subtitles.original: 漫画みたいなカルトまんまり張り合いとなってしまってる漫画
subtitles.english: A cult-like manga, it's become a manga where we're fully competing

subtitles.original: 圧倒的力　これであってもどき力
subtitles.english: Overwhelming power, even with this, it's just a mock power

subtitles.original: この下駄を履いていないこのツルに傷もついていない
subtitles.english: Not wearing these clogs, not a scratch on this vine

subtitles.original: 繰り返しをかわして誰かがついてゆく目覚め芝居
subtitles.english: Dodging the repetitions, someone follows the awakening performance

subtitles.original: 鏡よ鏡、答えちゃって
subtitles.english: Mirror, mirror, please answer

subtitles.original: Who the best? I'm the best! Oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
subtitles.english: Who the best? I'm the best! Oh yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah

subtitles.original: 生身のまま行けるどこまで
subtitles.english: How far can I go in the flesh?

subtitles.original: To the next, to the 1番上

subtitles.original: Los! Los! Los!
subtitles.english: Los! Los! Los!

subtitles.original: Feuer! Sperrfeuer! Feuer! Los!
subtitles.english: Fire! Barrage! Fire! Go!

subtitles.original: Achtung! Deckung! Hinlegen! Halt!
subtitles.english: Attention! Cover! Lie down! Stop!

subtitles.original: 戦場へ　前線へ　そして死の淵まで
subtitles.english: To the battlefield, to the front lines, and to the brink of death

subtitles.original: 命捨てた　その覚悟を示せ
subtitles.english: Show the resolve of having thrown away your life

subtitles.original: Feuer! Sperrfeuer! Feuer! Los!
subtitles.english: Fire! Barrage! Fire! Go!

subtitles.original: 聞こえるなら　あの咆哮(せい)が
subtitles.english: If you can hear that roar

subtitles.original: テイクオフする　魂(うち)の声だ
subtitles.english: It's the voice of the soul taking off

subtitles.original: 踏み潰せ
subtitles.english: Crush it underfoot

subtitles.original: 踏み潰せ
subtitles.english: Crush it underfoot

subtitles.original: 諸君、我々の任務は何だ？
subtitles.english: Gentlemen, what is our mission?

subtitles.original: 殲滅だ！　一機残らずの殲滅だ！
subtitles.english: Annihilation! Annihilation without leaving a single one!

subtitles.original: 為すべきことはただ一つ
subtitles.english: There is only one thing to do

subtitles.original: 地獄を作れ！
subtitles.english: Create hell!

subtitles.original: 鉄と火の雨に　打たれに行く合唱(こえ)
subtitles.english: The chorus of voices going to be pelted by the rain of iron and fire

subtitles.original: 笑止千万！
subtitles.english: Utterly ridiculous!

subtitles.original: 帝国の為だ！
subtitles.english: It's for the Empire!

subtitles.original: 戦場へ　前線へ　そして死の淵まで
subtitles.english: To the battlefield, to the front lines, and to the brink of death

subtitles.original: 命捨てた　覚悟を示せよ
subtitles.english: Show the resolve of having thrown away your life

subtitles.original: 忠誠を　順従を　そしてその魂を
subtitles.english: Loyalty, obedience, and that soul

subtitles.original: すべて捧げ　勝鬨を上げよう
subtitles.english: Offer everything and raise a victory cry

subtitles.original: さあ此処に　築いてみせろ
subtitles.english: Now, try and build it here

subtitles.original: 天に届く　死体の山を！
subtitles.english: A mountain of corpses that reaches the heavens!

subtitles.original: Feuer! Sperrfeuer! Feuer! Los!
subtitles.english: Fire! Barrage! Fire! Go!

subtitles.original: Achtung! Deckung! Hinlegen! Halt!
subtitles.english: Attention! Cover! Lie down! Stop!

subtitles.original: どこに恐怖が　あるというもんだ
subtitles.english: Where do you say there is fear?

subtitles.original: 血飛沫(みち)抜くが　花火のようだ
subtitles.english: Gushing blood is like fireworks

subtitles.original: 撒き散らせ
subtitles.english: Scatter it

subtitles.original: 撒き散らせ
subtitles.english: Scatter it

subtitles.original: 千の傷跡　忘れちゃいないさ
subtitles.english: I haven't forgotten the thousand scars

subtitles.original: 焔の熱も　こぼれた情も
subtitles.english: The heat of the flames, and the spilled emotions

subtitles.original: 断末魔最後(あと)の　呻きも見事(ひとみ)も
subtitles.english: The last groans of death, and the moments

subtitles.original: 嗚呼それこそを　求めるのだ！
subtitles.english: Ah, that is exactly what I seek!

subtitles.original: 慈悲(はね)も平和(へい)も　まして和解(わ)なんて
subtitles.english: Mercy, peace, let alone reconciliation

subtitles.original: 牙を捨てた　飼い犬の症状(さが)を
subtitles.english: The nature of a domestic dog that has lost its fangs

subtitles.original: 絶望と怒りを　かき混ぜ狂喜の沙汰は
subtitles.english: Mixing despair and anger, the state of madness

subtitles.original: 地獄よりも　楽園のようだ
subtitles.english: Is more like paradise than hell

subtitles.original: その四肢は　踊るために
subtitles.english: Those limbs are for dancing

subtitles.original: 踊り狂う　ためにあるのだ
subtitles.english: They exist to dance madly

subtitles.original: 人間に価値など無い。価値なき者同士の争いに、命の徒花を咲かせてみせろ！
subtitles.english: Humanity has no value. In the conflict between worthless beings, let the non-fruiting flowers of life bloom!

subtitles.original: 怯えも躊躇(ちゅう)も　狂った奴がつくってる
subtitles.english: Fear and hesitation are created by the insane

subtitles.original: まさにファルス　不条理(ふじょ)ばかりの
subtitles.english: It's truly a farce, full of absurdity

subtitles.original: 起承転結！
subtitles.english: Introduction, development, twist, and conclusion!

subtitles.original: 戦場へ　前線へ　そして死の淵まで
subtitles.english: To the battlefield, to the front lines, and to the brink of death

subtitles.original: 命捨てた　覚悟を示せよ
subtitles.english: Show the resolve of having thrown away your life

subtitles.original: 忠誠を　順従を　そして其の魂を
subtitles.english: Loyalty, obedience, and that soul

subtitles.original: すべて捧げ　勝鬨を上げよう
subtitles.english: Offer everything and raise a victory cry

subtitles.original: さあ此処に　築いてみせろ
subtitles.english: Now, try and build it here

subtitles.original: 天に届く　死体の山に
subtitles.english: On the mountain of corpses that reaches the heavens

subtitles.original: 木霊する　憎しみを
subtitles.english: The hatred that echoes
